sentences.en: Both horse and rider were dripping with sweat within five minutes.
sentences.cn: 没过五分钟，马和骑手都大汗淋漓。

sentences.en: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.cn: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.en: He was a champion for Latinos and blacks within the educational system.
sentences.cn: 他一直致力于在教育系统内为美籍拉美人和黑人争取权益。

sentences.en: Her case falls within the ambit of moral law.
sentences.cn: 她的案例属于道德法律的范畴。

sentences.en: I will take any job that comes along, within reason.
sentences.cn: 我会接受任何给我的工作，只要是正当的。

sentences.en: Isabelle placed a wine cup on the table within his reach.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔把酒杯放在桌上他伸手可及的地方。

sentences.en: It was within easy walking distance of the hotel.
No one carrying arms is allowed within the precincts of a temple.
sentences.cn: 携带武器者不得进入神殿的界域。

sentences.en: The Atlantic coast is within sight of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 从宾馆可以看见大西洋海岸。

sentences.en: The dollar fell to within a hair's breadth of its all-time low.
sentences.cn: 美元差一点跌到了最低点。

sentences.en: The home is situated within easy access of shops and other facilities.
sentences.cn: 房子位置便利，距离商店及其他设施都不远。

sentences.en: The magazine's aim is to discuss topical issues within a Christian framework.
sentences.cn: 该杂志的宗旨是在基督教框架下讨论时下的热门话题。

sentences.en: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.cn: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.en: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.cn: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.en: Within criminal law almost anything could be defined as "crime".
sentences.cn: 在刑法中，几乎任何行为都可以被界定为“犯罪”。

sentences.en: Within hours, police corralled the three men Lewis had named.
sentences.cn: 几小时之内，警察就抓到了刘易斯提到的那三个人。

sentences.en: Within quarter of an hour the coldness of the night had gone.
sentences.cn: 不到一刻钟，夜晚的寒气就一扫而光。

trans.tran_cn: 在…之内/里，在…心中（有某种情感），看/听得见，够得着
trans.tran_en: before a certain period of time has passed
